title: A local candidate wants to transcend party. Does Texas allow that?
Harris County, home to Houston, warns of delays in counting ballots.
Gov. Greg Abbott wins the G.O.P. nomination, defeating challengers from the right.
Beto O’Rourke snags the Democratic nomination for Texas governor.

sentence: AZ-Sen: Wealthy businessman Jim Lamon's new spot for the August Republican primary rhetorically asks how Democratic incumbent Mark Kelly, who has only been in office since December of 2020, can run "to solve the problems you've created?"
title: Morning Digest: A day after being forced into surprise runoff, Texas congressman quits amid scandal

sentence: “This is a crisis, and in my estimation, because of a lack of planning from the administration, it’s about to get worse,” said Sen. Mark Kelly of Arizona.
author: Via AP news wire
title: Vulnerable Dems plead with Biden to delay reopening asylum

sentence: Sen. Mark Kelly said it’s “unacceptable to end Title 42 without a plan and coordination in place to ensure a secure, orderly, and humane process at the border.”
author: Lydia O'Connor
title: Gov. Greg Abbott Says Texas Will Bus Undocumented Immigrants To D.C.

sentence: (Other Democrats joining Sinema in support of the bill are her fellow Arizonan Mark Kelly, a vulnerable Democrat facing reelection this year; Maggie Hassan of New Hampshire, also in a tough re-election fight; Montana’s Jon Tester; and Sinema’s fellow conservative, Joe Manchin of West Virginia.)
author: Eric Lutz
title: Texas: We're Going to Bus Undocumented Migrants to D.C., Florida: Hold My Beer

sentence: The Democratic senators on board with the upper chamber bill to keep Title 42 as long as the health emergency remains are moderates Krysten Sinema of Arizona and Joe Manchin of West Virginia as well as Mark Kelly of Arizona, Maggie Hassan of New Hampshire and Jon Tester of Montana.
author: Katelyn Caralle
title: Now 11 DEMOCRATS oppose Biden ending Title 42: Texas Rep. Henry Cuellar is the latest to join bipartisan legislation to KEEP the pandemic-era policy at the border

sentence: Arizona’s two Democratic senators, Kyrsten Sinema and Mark Kelly, already have expressed their opposition, and others are now joining in.
author: Jarrett Stepman
title: Biden’s Radical Open Borders Policies Prompt Pushback

sentence: Sen. Mark Kelly, an Arizona Democrat up for election this year, toured the border last week and warned that the Biden administration is unprepared for asylum restrictions to be lifted.
title: Migrant crossings spike as US plans to lift curb on asylum

sentence: That is likely why Democratic Sen. Mark Kelly (Ariz.), who is facing reelection in a tight contest this year, is being so openly critical of DHS’s handling of illegal migration at the Southwest border, and its ability to deal with a post Title 42 migrant tsunami: Right now we have a crisis on our southern border.
author: Andrew R. Arthur
title: Polling Shows Trouble for Biden
